name: EKRecurrenceDayOfWeek
desc: A class that represents the day of the week.

items.name: init(EKWeekday)
items.desc: Creates and returns a day of the week with a given day.

items.name: init(EKWeekday, weekNumber: Int)
items.desc: Creates and returns an autoreleased day of the week with a given day and week number.

items.name: init(dayOfTheWeek: EKWeekday, weekNumber: Int)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a day of the week with a given day and week number.

items.name: var weekNumber: Int
items.desc: The week number of the day of the week.
